title: Benchmarking online sequence-to-sequence and character-based handwriting recognition from IMU-enhanced pens
venue: International Journal on Document Analysis and Recognition

tldr.text: This paper provides an evaluation benchmark for seq2seq and single character-based HWR using recurrent and temporal convolutional networks and transformers combined with a connectionist temporal classification (CTC) loss and cross-entropy (CE) losses, and shows that CE variants can improve the single classification task.
